name: Hands(Studio Outtake)
content: It would be that we're all okay
And useless in times like these
Our hands are small nice weapons
As the darkness most feared
Our hands are small I know
And we shall go unbroken
Some things are subject to a higher law
You do not own us you who never saw
There's our shackles singing
Our hands are small I know
And we shall go unbroken
In the end only kindness matters
In the end only kindness matters
Oh some things cannot be broken
Some things can't be undone
You cannot ever take away
What has already been won
Our hands are small I know
And we shall go unbroken
We shall go unbroken
